official_title: Intrathoracic Esophagogastric Anastomosis After Robot Assisted Minimally Invasive Esophagectomy Using STRATAFIX

criteria.raw_text:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. All patients with esophageal cancer who are deemed candidates for minimally invasive robot assisted Ivor Lewis esophagogastrostomy.
2. Patients who provide written informed consent for the study.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Any patient with esophageal cancer who is not deemed a surgical candidate or who is not deemed a candidate for the Ivor Lewis technique of esophagectomy (with intrathoracic anastomosis).
2. Any patient less than 18 years of age

healthyVolunteers: True

sex: ALL

minimumAge: 18 Years

stdAges: ['ADULT', 'OLDER_ADULT']
